channel.title: Moparscape Teamspeak server
channel.description:
[center][b]Moparscape TeamSpeak server[/b][/center]
Server Ip: 65.75.242.238
[u]How to use TeamSpeak[/u]
Thanks to [url=http://dontcamp.com/tstutorial/]here[/url] for the tut.
First off, download the TS2 Client (Win), from [url=http://teamspeak.com/?page=downloads]Here[/url]. That's the program you will need to connect to the Server.
After downloading the client and installing it, run the program and click Connection->Connect.
[img]http://dontcamp.com/tstutorial/pic1.jpg[/img]
Right-click in the big white space and click Add Server.
[img]http://dontcamp.com/tstutorial/pic2.jpg[/img]
Label it Moparscape and put 65.75.242.238 in the Server Address field.
Make sure that Anonymous is checked, NOT Registered .
Check Auto-Reconnect.
Hit Connect and BAM, it will connect you to the TS server. Hitting Connect also saves the configuration, so next time you start the program you just have to select it from the list instead of typing everything in.

item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

[center]Moparscape TeamSpeak server[/center]

Server Ip: 65.75.242.238

How to use TeamSpeak

Thanks to here for the tut.

First off, download the TS2 Client (Win), from Here. Thatâ€™s the program you will need to connect to the Server.

After downloading the client and installing it, run the program and click Connection->Connect.

Right-click in the big white space and click Add Server.

Label it Moparscape and put 65.75.242.238 in the Server Address field.

Make sure that Anonymous is checked, NOT Registered .

Check Auto-Reconnect.

Hit Connect and BAM, it will connect you to the TS server. Hitting Connect also saves the configuration, so next time you start the program you just have to select it from the list instead of typing everything in.
